confer.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to discuss something with other people, so that everyone can express their opinions and decide on something
confer.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Franklin leant over and conferred with his attorneys.
confer.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to discuss something with other people in order to make a decision based on more than one personâ€™s opinion
confer.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The chairwoman is conferring with the board later today.
